nodes.text: Twin Suns Three was a callsign for the third pilot in Twin Suns Squadron. Mara Jade Skywalker was the first to use it, followed quickly by Zindra Daine and then Jagged Fel. The position was later taken on by an unnamed man, then an anonymous woman after the unit's reorganization, and then another man. Fel later used his brief affiliation with the callsign to create the alias Twinsins Thlee.
